intro: Matayba clavelligera, commonly known as the narrow-leaved matayba, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to South America, particularly Brazil, and thrives in tropical and subtropical climates. Matayba clavelligera is often found in moist, open habitats such as savannas and forest edges.
